sys_user_011: The account is combined with 6-25 characters, with the first character of letter.
sys_user_013: The username can only be the combine of letters and numbers, and the first character cannot be a number.
sys_user_confim_001: Are you sure you want to enable this user? Once enabled, this user will be able to log in to the system normally. Are you sure you want to continue?
sys_user_confim_002: Are you sure you want to disable this user? After disabling, this user will not be able to log in to the system. Are you sure you want to continue?
sys_user_confim_003: Please note that disabling a user may affect their related business and permissions. If you confirm to disable this user, please proceed with caution.
sys_user_confim_004: Are you sure you want to reset this user's password? After resetting, this user will need to log in to the system with a new password. Are you sure you want to continue?
sys_user_confim_005: Please note that resetting a user's password may affect their related business and permissions. If you confirm to reset this user's password, please proceed with caution.
sys_user_confim_006: Are you sure you want to delete this user? After deletion, this user will not be able to log in to the system. Are you sure you want to continue?
sys_user_confim_007: Please note that deleting a user may affect their related business and permissions. If you confirm to delete this user, please proceed with caution.
